entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 2:41PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...High Water On The Koyukuk River This Week... Runoff from heavy rain in the Brooks Range late last week is moving down the Koyukuk River. The crest of high water is expected to reach Huslia from Wednesday into Thursday. This high water will cause erosion of the Koyukuk River bank at Huslia.
